00034 #include "contiki.h"
00035 #ifdef __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__
00036 #include <msp430.h>
00037 #else
00038 #include <io.h>
00039 #include <signal.h>
00040 #endif
00041 #include "dev/watchdog.h"
00042 
00043 static int counter = 0;
00044 
00045 #define PRINT_STACK_ON_REBOOT 0
00046 
00047 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00048 #if PRINT_STACK_ON_REBOOT
00049 #ifdef CONTIKI_TARGET_SKY
00050 static void
00051 printchar(char c)
00052 {
00053   /* Transmit the data. */
00054   TXBUF1 = c;
00055 
00056   /* Loop until the transmission buffer is available. */
00057   while((IFG2 & UTXIFG1) == 0);
00058 
00059 }
00060 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00061 static void
00062 hexprint(uint8_t v)
00063 {
00064   const char hexconv[] = "0123456789abcdef";
00065   printchar(hexconv[v >> 4]);
00066   printchar(hexconv[v & 0x0f]);
00067 }
00068 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00069 static void
00070 printstring(char *s)
00071 {
00072   while(*s) {
00073     printchar(*s++);
00074   }
00075 }
00076 #endif /* CONTIKI_TARGET_SKY */
00077 #endif /* PRINT_STACK_ON_REBOOT */
00078 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00079 #ifdef __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__
00080 #pragma vector=WDT_VECTOR
00081 __interrupt void
00082 #else
00083 interrupt(WDT_VECTOR)
00084 #endif
00085 watchdog_interrupt(void)
00086 {
00087 #ifdef CONTIKI_TARGET_SKY
00088 #if PRINT_STACK_ON_REBOOT
00089   uint8_t dummy;
00090   static uint8_t *ptr;
00091   static int i;
00092 
00093   ptr = &dummy;
00094   printstring("Watchdog reset");
00095   printstring("\nStack at $");
00096   hexprint(((int)ptr) >> 8);
00097   hexprint(((int)ptr) & 0xff);
00098   printstring(":\n");
00099 
00100   for(i = 0; i < 64; ++i) {
00101     hexprint(ptr[i]);
00102     printchar(' ');
00103     if((i & 0x0f) == 0x0f) {
00104       printchar('\n');
00105     }
00106   }
00107   printchar('\n');
00108 #endif /* PRINT_STACK_ON_REBOOT */
00109 #endif /* CONTIKI_TARGET_SKY */
00110 
00111   watchdog_reboot();
00112 }
00113 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00114 void
00115 watchdog_init(void)
00116 {
00117   /* The MSP430 watchdog is enabled at boot-up, so we stop it during
00118      initialization. */
00119   counter = 0;
00120   watchdog_stop();
00121 
00122   IFG1 &= ~WDTIFG;
00123   IE1 |= WDTIE;
00124 }
00125 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00126 void
00127 watchdog_start(void)
00128 {
00129   /* We setup the watchdog to reset the device after one second,
00130      unless watchdog_periodic() is called. */
00131   counter--;
00132   if(counter == 0) {
00133     WDTCTL = WDTPW | WDTCNTCL | WDT_ARST_1000 | WDTTMSEL;
00134   }
00135 }
00136 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00137 void
00138 watchdog_periodic(void)
00139 {
00140   /* This function is called periodically to restart the watchdog
00141      timer. */
00142   /*  if(counter < 0) {*/
00143     WDTCTL = (WDTCTL & 0xff) | WDTPW | WDTCNTCL | WDTTMSEL;
00144     /*  }*/
00145 }
00146 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00147 void
00148 watchdog_stop(void)
00149 {
00150   counter++;
00151   if(counter == 1) {
00152     WDTCTL = WDTPW | WDTHOLD;
00153   }
00154 }
00155 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00156 void
00157 watchdog_reboot(void)
00158 {
00159   WDTCTL = 0;
00160 }
00161 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
